resources.string: Thank you for installing! \n\nLets get started by connecting to your wearable!

Wearables are now connected!

To get you started, we've also added a few gestures from the commonly used apps that you've installed. 

Enjoy!
This will reload the initial gestures based on what apps you have installed. All of your current gestures *will* be overwrote. Continue?
Connecting... Please make sure this app is opened on your watch
Please wait for wearable to sync and try again...
This app is completely free, it is the best support to us if you could take a moment to rate it on Google Play Store!
Do you want to delete Gesture \'

To add a gesture, tap the add button 

To delete a gesture, tap on it 

To find out more and help, tap the three dot menu at the top right corner
Fail to delete, wearable no respond

You can backup a copy of all the current gestures in your phone, so the changes after that won\'t affect this copy, even if you uninstall the wearable app. After backup, You can restore the copy to overwrite all current gestures.
Please draw the new pattern that you would like to create
Please only change this when there is a problem with recognition of your gestures
Go back to main screen to save settings
It looks like Tasker is not installed. With Tasker, you can control much more operations and connect with other apps. You can use this function once Tasker is installed!
Access to Tasker is denied, please make sure you Enabled External Access from Tasker -> Preference -> Misc.

There was a problem while connecting to Tasker: %s \n\nIf this problem continue to occur, please try reinstall Wear Gesture Launcher on this device after installing Tasker, your gesture library will be saved on your wearable.
Enter action name for calling number
You have created all items in this section!
Gesture didn\'t save, wearable sync failed, please try again
Possible gesture collision: \\nGreat! No similar gestures found
You are going to overwrite an existing backup, with current gesture library containing %d gestures. Continue?
You are going to overwrite all the current gestures, and restore the backup gesture library copy on %s. The wearable gesture library will also be overwrote. Continue?
Please draw the gesture for action \'%s\'
WGL Service Re-initiated, please send the action again.
If you have any issues or suggestions, you can click the button to send an email for feedback. We will reply and adapt the change as soon as possible!
There is no way to run %s :(
High accuracy could cause gestures too hard to be recognized
Low accuracy could cause gestures too easy to be recognized
Warning: This will skip the filtering, allow every best match gesture to be executed!!

Thank you for using! 
If you have any issues or suggestions, please email me at 
henryzhang9802@gmail.com 

Special thanks to Thomas and Joerg Dietz 

Mobile version code: %1$d 
Version name: %2$s 
Wear version code: %3$d
Mobile app Version %1$d \nWear app Version %2$d \nVersion not consistent, please wait for play store auto-update or update manually to make sure sync running properly.
Wearable no respond, please make sure the wearable app is installed and opened on your watch, and try again.
